name: door_getStatus
description: This function is used to request the status of a SmartThings device's door.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to get the door status.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to get the door status.
